title: Traveller fonts (brush I guess)
content:
I appreciate if you could help me to identify these fonts from Traveller: The New Era rpg.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824im_/http:/typophile.com/files/000_5964.jpg)
  
Unknown brush cover font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824im_/http:/typophile.com/files/444_3448.jpg)
  
Unknown title font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OPTICharterOak_5260.jpg)
  
OPTICharterOak (cover)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ITC_Stone_4585.jpg)
  
ITC Stone (titles)

Thanks ^\_^

Font: 

 Sprint 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Traveller TNE cover](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/http:/typophile.com/files/000_0.jpg) | 64.1 KB |
| [Titles font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/http:/typophile.com/files/444_0.jpg) | 26.58 KB |
author: Meriba

comments.content:
|OF SUPPORT MATERIAL| is Sprint, by Aldo Novarese:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/sprint/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/sprint/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/sprint/")

Thank you both, but cover title is already known as I said in the first post.

I miss the cover font of the text: The New Era

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824im_/http:/typophile.com/files/000_5023.jpg)
The /e are somewhat different so the title could be entirely handwritten.

As for your jagged script lettering you might find something similar that you could use as a substitute at [http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script14Pg1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script14Pg1.html "http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script14Pg1.html")  
Don

A few suggestions:  
Mistral [aka Staccato 222/555] [http://www.identifont.com/find?font=mistral&q=Go](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=mistral&q=Go "http://www.identifont.com/find?font=mistral&q=Go")  
Choc [http://www.identifont.com/find?font=choc&q=Go](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=choc&q=Go "http://www.identifont.com/find?font=choc&q=Go")  
Rage Italic [http://www.identifont.com/find?font=rage+italic&q=Go](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=rage+italic&q=Go "http://www.identifont.com/find?font=rage+italic&q=Go")  
Streetbrush [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/robarnow/streetbrush/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/robarnow/streetbrush/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/robarnow/streetbrush/")  
Legault [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/legault/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/legault/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/legault/")  
Mustang [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/robarnow/mustang/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153824/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/robarnow/mustang/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/robarnow/mustang/")  
Don
Thanks everyone! Finally I created the few characters I needed with a vector program.
